name: Kig and Kog!
description:
Kig and Kog the brothers cog!? Work together to: rotate, twist and grind, to escape the factory they were once made in. Help these tiny tin troublemakers on their journey to freedom through multiple colourful levels of their factory.

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button - Lock Cog - Clicking again locks the other Cog

Right Mouse Button - Unlock Cogs

A - Rotate Counter Clockwise

D - Rotate Clockwise

W - Extend Chain (If Available)

S - Retract Chain (If Available)

R - Reset to start of Screen

All attempts to remove softlocks have been made but some small softlocks may still remain.
